channel.title: [PI] -AmbitionPk- [PI] Searching for a team, Updating Daily
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/akbfo0.jpg[/img][/center] ik== spelling faulth xd
[center][b]Intro[/b][/center]
[center]Hi Moparscapers, my name is Jens and i am looking for a developement team. The server will be succesfull (I'm pretty sure). The server will be based on soulsplit 317, The one that Exorta released over here, That means it will be completely started from scratch. AmbitionPK will be hosted on a VPS and I'm probably buying Anti-DDOS fireware.[/center]
[center]If you like making something [b]good[/b], something [b]special[/b] and something [b]unique[/b], is this something for [b][u][i]you[/i][/u][/b].[/center]
[center][b]Features By Exorta[/b]
[code]*255 region fix(Fix by Arista) * No Lag * Turmoil * All Godswords with Real Special * 100% Duel Arena (Staking,Rules,and ability to disable armor slots) * Training * Amazing hybriding * Autocasting * Barrows * Pest Control * Clan Chat * Skilling * Slayer with Tasks * God Wars * KBD * Dagannoth Kings * Chaos Elemental * Fight Pits * Jad * Obelisks that teleport you around in wild * Split Private Chat * Duping Fixed * Emotes * Trade with no Bugs * Great Economy * Custom SoulSplit point shop * Perfect Pking! [/code][/center]
[center][b]What will I be doing?[/b]
I will run the server 24.7 (VPS) when coding is done. I will buy a domain. I will code a bit.[/center]
[center][b]Media[/b][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/fwh8cm.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Update logg:[/b][/center]
[center] Will be updated soon [/center]
[center][b]Goals[/b][/center]
[b][center]- Getting an amazing community - Getting friendly staff - Getting the 600+ things on a 317 cache (Summoning, Dungeoneering, 634 models) - Creating something unique - A stable server - Up to 100 players. [/center]
[center][b]Applications:[/b][/center]
- Beta Tester [3/7] (Me, OmgItsShane, michael tirrwel) - Hoster [0/1] (VPS soon) - Programmer [1/2] (OmgItsShane (Parttime)+ Jake ) - Client Coder [0/1] - Gfx Artist [1/1] (GFX john) - Website Coder [1/1]( mich27003)
[center][b]Application Forms:[/b][/center]
Programmer Form:
[code]Applying for: Programmer Something about yourself: Name: Ingame Name: Age: Experience(Years,Months): Motivation: Msn: [/code]
Client Coder form:
[code] Applying for: Client developer Something about yourself: Name: Ingame name: Age: Past work: Experience(Year,Months): Motivation: Msn: [/code]
Web Developer form:
[code] Applying for: Web Developer Something about yourself: Name: Ingame Name: Age: What code do you work with(PhP,vBulletin,etc): Past Websites/Work: Experience(Years,Months): Motivation: Msn: [/code]
GFX'er Form:
[code]Applying for: GFX'ER Something about yourself: Name: Ingame Name: Age: Past Work: Experience(Years,Months): Motivation: Msn: [/code]
Beta Tester and Hoster:
Just reply to this, pm me via here or add my msn.
[color=red][size=18pt][center][b]Feel free to contact me over msn, Jens_midi@hotmail.com or pming me via mopar![/b][/center]
[center][u]Credits ]Me for doing this. Exorta/Pim for his amazing source and client. nL for his app forms.[/u] ..[/center]

item.title: [PI] -AmbitionPk- [PI] Searching for a team, Updating Daily
item.dc:creator: @n0_b0rd3rs n0 b0rd3rs
item.description:
@n0_b0rd3rs wrote:

[quote=“mich702703, post:16, topic:405152”]Applying for: Web Developer/Web GFX
Sommering about yourself: I am 15 years, live in Belgium, got a girlfriend, learning web development at school .
Name: Michaël Schauwers
Ingame Name: Infection_Z
Age: 15
What code do you work with(PhP,vBulletin,etc): HTML, JS, PHP(XHTML), CSS
Past Websites/Work: Strikerzone.be (has quited i think), Mine-Reign.com (dunno if still online), PK-Revolution.com
Experience(Years,Months): 2 years
Motivation: I have alot of free time and i wanted to do something again in the RSPS scene.
Msn: michael_schauwers@hotmail.com

Applying for: Client developer/part time
Past work: Pk-Revolution / TorvaScape
Experience(Year,Months): 2 years
Other: Willing to do this part time, so i could make most of our ingame stuff shown into our website

Heres something i made quickly

whats the font?[/quote][quote=“Gfx John, post:15, topic:405152”]Applying for: GFX’ER
Something about yourself: My name is John am 17 and i got a girlfriend that’s pregnant am gonna find out if its a boy or a girl in a few weeks ( hope its a boy )
Name: John
Ingame Name: John
Age:17
Past Work: I worked for lots of servers Immortal Pvp Rampage X and i even made that banner up there
Experience(Years,Months): 4 years
Motivation:My girlfriend gives me motivation cause she tells me to keep on doing what i love best and that’s GFx Designing
Msn: gfxjohn@hotmail.com

Heres something i made quickly

[/quote]

ACCEPTED

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @n0_b0rd3rs n0 b0rd3rs
item.description:
@n0_b0rd3rs wrote:

[center][/center] ik== spelling faulth xd

[center]Intro[/center]

[center]Hi Moparscapers, my name is Jens and i am looking for a developement team. The server will be succesfull (I’m pretty sure). The server will be based on soulsplit 317, The one that Exorta released over here, That means it will be completely started from scratch. AmbitionPK will be hosted on a VPS and I’m probably buying Anti-DDOS fireware.[/center]

[center]If you like making something good, something special and something unique, is this something for you.[/center]

[center]Features By Exorta

[code]*255 region fix(Fix by Arista)

  • No Lag
  • Turmoil
  • All Godswords with Real Special
  • 100% Duel Arena (Staking,Rules,and ability to disable armor slots)
  • Training
  • Amazing hybriding
  • Autocasting
  • Barrows
  • Pest Control
  • Clan Chat
  • Skilling
  • Slayer with Tasks
  • God Wars
  • KBD
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Chaos Elemental
  • Fight Pits
  • Jad
  • Obelisks that teleport you around in wild
  • Split Private Chat
  • Duping Fixed
  • Emotes
  • Trade with no Bugs
  • Great Economy
  • Custom SoulSplit point shop
  • Perfect Pking!
    [/code][/center]

[center]What will I be doing?

I will run the server 24.7 (VPS) when coding is done.
I will buy a domain.
I will code a bit.[/center]

[center]Media[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]Update logg:[/center]

[center]
Will be updated soon
[/center]

[center]Goals[/center]

[b][center]- Getting an amazing community

  • Getting friendly staff
  • Getting the 600+ things on a 317 cache (Summoning, Dungeoneering, 634 models)
  • Creating something unique
  • A stable server
  • Up to 100 players.
    [/center]

[center]Applications:[/center]

  • Beta Tester [3/7] (Me, OmgItsShane, michael tirrwel)

  • Hoster [0/1] (VPS soon)

  • Programmer [1/2] (OmgItsShane (Parttime)+ Jake )

  • Client Coder [0/1]

  • Gfx Artist [1/1] (GFX john)

  • Website Coder 1/1

                   [center][b]Application Forms:[/b][/center]

Programmer Form:

Applying for: Programmer Something about yourself: Name: Ingame Name: Age: Experience(Years,Months): Motivation: Msn:

[color=red][size=18pt][center]Feel free to contact me over msn, Jens_midi@hotmail.com or pming me via mopar![/center]
